SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

io.libraft.algorithm
Interface RPCSender

public interface RPCSender

Raft RPC message sending service. RaftAlgorithm uses this component to send the following RPC messages to other servers in the Raft cluster:

  • RequestVote
  • RequestVoteReply
  • AppendEntries
  • AppendEntriesReply

Implementations do not have to validate the correctness of message fields. They only have to offer best-effort delivery semantics. Messages may be sent or received out-of-order, may be duplicated, or may be lost. Implementations may choose to retry sending on the sender's behalf without notifying the sender. All implementation-specific checked exceptions must be wrapped in an RPCException and rethrown.

RaftAlgorithm will be notified of incoming messages via the corresponding callback methods in RPCReceiver. There is a corresponding callback method for each method below.

Method Summary
 void appendEntries(String server, long term, long commitIndex, long prevLogIndex, long prevLogTerm, Collection<LogEntry> entries)
          Send an AppendEntries.
 void appendEntriesReply(String server, long term, long prevLogIndex, long entryCount, boolean applied)
          Send an AppendEntriesReply.

 void requestVoteReply(String server, long term, boolean voteGranted)

Method Detail

requestVote

void requestVote(String server,
                 long term,
                 long lastLogIndex,
                 long lastLogTerm)
                 throws RPCException
Send a RequestVote.

Parameters:
server - unique id of the Raft server to which the message should be sent
term - election term in which this message was generated
lastLogIndex - index of the last LogEntry in the local Raft server's Raft log
lastLogTerm - election term in which the LogEntry at lastLogIndex was created
Throws:
RPCException
See Also:
LogEntry

requestVoteReply

void requestVoteReply(String server,
                      long term,
                      boolean voteGranted)
                      throws RPCException
Send a RequestVoteReply. Response to a RequestVote.

Parameters:
server - unique id of the Raft server to which the message should be sent
term - election term in which this message was generated
voteGranted - true if the local Raft server granted server its vote in term, false otherwise
Throws:
RPCException

appendEntries

void appendEntries(String server,
                   long term,
                   long commitIndex,
                   long prevLogIndex,
                   long prevLogTerm,
                   @Nullable
                   Collection<LogEntry> entries)
                   throws RPCException
Send an AppendEntries.

Parameters:
server - unique id of the Raft server to which the message should be sent
term - election term in which this message was generated
commitIndex - index of the last LogEntry that the local Raft server believes to be committed
prevLogIndex - index of the LogEntry immediately before the first LogEntry in entries
prevLogTerm - election term in which the LogEntry at prevLogIndex was created
entries - sequence of monotonic, gapless, LogEntry instances with indices prevLogIndex + 1, prevLogIndex + 2 .. prevLogIndex + entries.count(). null if this AppendEntries message is a heartbeat
Throws:
RPCException
See Also:
LogEntry

appendEntriesReply

void appendEntriesReply(String server,
                        long term,
                        long prevLogIndex,
                        long entryCount,
                        boolean applied)
                        throws RPCException
Send an AppendEntriesReply. Response to an AppendEntries.

Parameters:
server - unique id of the Raft server to which the message should be sent
term - election term in which this message was generated
prevLogIndex - index of the LogEntry after which log entries were meant to be appended to the local Raft server's log
entryCount - number of log entries meant to be appended to the source server's log. 0, if this is a response to a heartbeat
applied - true if the log prefix uniquely defined by (prevLogIndex, prevLogTerm) in the AppendEntries request matched and the local Raft server was able to append the entries prevLogIndex + 1 to prevLogIndex + entryCount to its log. false otherwise
Throws:
RPCException
See Also:
LogEntry
